params.name: examples
params.description: List of InputExamples or tf.data.Dataset containing the examples.

params.name: tokenizer
params.description: Instance of a tokenizer that will tokenize the examples

params.name: max_length
params.description: Maximum example length. Defaults to the tokenizers max_len

params.name: label_list
params.description: List of labels. Can be obtained from the processor using the processor.get_labels() method

params.name: output_mode
params.description: String indicating the output mode. Either regression or classification
